title: Govt following policy of supremacy of law, constitution: PM
content:
LAHORE, Mar 17 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Wednesday said that the government was following the policy of supremacy of law and constitution as well as accountability without any discrimination.
The lawyers’ community had very important role in the provision of justice, he added
The Prime Minister expressed these views while talking to a delegation of the office bearers of lawyers’ bodies which led by Advocate General Punjab Ahmad Awais called on him here.
Federal Minister Shafqat Mehmood, Special Assistant to PM Shehzad Akbar, Senator Ali Zafar, Chief Minister Punjab Usman Buzdar and Special Assistant to CM Dr. Firdous Ashiq Awan were also present.
Members of Pakistan Bar Council Shafqat Mehmood and Ishtiaq Khan, Chairman Executive Committee of Punjab Bar Council Sardar Abdul Basit and Vice Chairman Amjad Iqbal Khan, President of Islamabad High Court Bar Association Zahid Mehmood Raja, President of High Court Bar Association (Multan) Syed Riaz-ul-Hassan Gilani and President of High Court Bar Association (Rawalpind)  Sardar Abdul Razzak were part of the delegation.
The delegation of lawyers expressed their commitment of fully supporting the government’s policies.
